nodeMetric.field_description: Campaign Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

body.summary: Campaign Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your digital advertisements within a campaign at least once. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Campaign Impressions is a count of the total number of times digital advertisements within a campaign are shown. A campaign is a grouping of ads organized by business objective.
Ad Reach is a count of the number of people who viewed your ads at least once. Reach can help you understand how many people have been exposed to a specific advertisement or marketing message.
Ad Impressions (IMPR) is a count of the total number of times digital advertisements display on someoneâ€™s screen within the publisher's network.
